lexUnit.name: marry (into).v
lexUnit.definition: COD: become a member of (a family) by marriage.

sentence.text: For a long time Bayonne was an English possession , having been part of the extensive territorial dowry of Eleanor of Aquitaine when she married into the Plantagenet family in the middle of the twelfth century .

Fergie , of course , should never have married into the Royal Family at all .
